scripts.copy:fa: mkdir -p resources/public/webfonts && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css resources/public/css/fontawesome.css && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* resources/public/webfonts/
scripts.dev: npm run copy:fa && npm run css:watch & npx shadow-cljs watch app
scripts.build: npm run copy:fa && npm run css:build && npx shadow-cljs release app
